rows.title: How do I count the occurrences of a list item?

417:
<p>I've compared all suggested solutions (and a few new ones) with <a href="https://github.com/nschloe/perfplot" rel="noreferrer">perfplot</a> (a small project of mine).</p>
<h3 id="counting-one-item-ikoj">Counting <em>one</em> item</h3>
<p>For large enough arrays, it turns out that</p>
<pre class="lang-py s-code-block"><code class="hljs language-python">numpy.<span class="hljs-built_in">sum</span>(numpy.array(a) == <span class="hljs-number">1</span>)
</code></pre>
<p>is slightly faster than the other solutions.</p>
<p><a href="https://i.stack.imgur.com/vTw7i.png" rel="noreferrer"><img src="https://i.stack.imgur.com/vTw7i.png" alt="enter image description here"></a></p>
<h3 id="counting-all-items-4cam">Counting <em>all</em> items</h3>
<p><a href="https://stackoverflow.com/a/43096495/353337">As established before</a>,</p>
<pre class="lang-py s-code-block"><code class="hljs language-python">numpy.bincount(a)
</code></pre>
<p>is what you want.</p>
<p><a href="https://i.stack.imgur.com/IE6L3.png" rel="noreferrer"><img src="https://i.stack.imgur.com/IE6L3.png" alt="enter image description here"></a></p>
<hr>
<p>Code to reproduce the plots:</p>

<pre class="lang-py s-code-block"><code class="hljs language-python"><span class="hljs-keyword">from</span> collections <span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> Counter
<span class="hljs-keyword">from</span> collections <span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> defaultdict
<span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> numpy
<span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> operator
<span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> pandas
<span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> perfplot


<span class="hljs-keyword">def</span> <span class="hljs-title function_">counter</span>(<span class="hljs-params">a</span>):
    <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> Counter(a)


<span class="hljs-keyword">def</span> <span class="hljs-title function_">count</span>(<span class="hljs-params">a</span>):
    <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">dict</span>((i, a.count(i)) <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> i <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">set</span>(a))


<span class="hljs-keyword">def</span> <span class="hljs-title function_">bincount</span>(<span class="hljs-params">a</span>):
    <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> numpy.bincount(a)


<span class="hljs-keyword">def</span> <span class="hljs-title function_">pandas_value_counts</span>(<span class="hljs-params">a</span>):
    <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> pandas.Series(a).value_counts()


<span class="hljs-keyword">def</span> <span class="hljs-title function_">occur_dict</span>(<span class="hljs-params">a</span>):
    d = {}
    <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> i <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> a:
        <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> i <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> d:
            d[i] = d[i]+<span class="hljs-number">1</span>
        <span class="hljs-keyword">else</span>:
            d[i] = <span class="hljs-number">1</span>
    <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> d


<span class="hljs-keyword">def</span> <span class="hljs-title function_">count_unsorted_list_items</span>(<span class="hljs-params">items</span>):
    counts = defaultdict(<span class="hljs-built_in">int</span>)
    <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> item <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> items:
        counts[item] += <span class="hljs-number">1</span>
    <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">dict</span>(counts)


<span class="hljs-keyword">def</span> <span class="hljs-title function_">operator_countof</span>(<span class="hljs-params">a</span>):
    <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">dict</span>((i, operator.countOf(a, i)) <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> i <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">set</span>(a))


perfplot.show(
    setup=<span class="hljs-keyword">lambda</span> n: <span class="hljs-built_in">list</span>(numpy.random.randint(<span class="hljs-number">0</span>, <span class="hljs-number">100</span>, n)),
    n_range=[<span class="hljs-number">2</span>**k <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> k <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">range</span>(<span class="hljs-number">20</span>)],
    kernels=[
        counter, count, bincount, pandas_value_counts, occur_dict,
        count_unsorted_list_items, operator_countof
        ],
    equality_check=<span class="hljs-literal">None</span>,
    logx=<span class="hljs-literal">True</span>,
    logy=<span class="hljs-literal">True</span>,
    )
</code></pre>
<ol start="2">
<li></li>
</ol>
<pre class="lang-py s-code-block"><code class="hljs language-python"><span class="hljs-keyword">from</span> collections <span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> Counter
<span class="hljs-keyword">from</span> collections <span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> defaultdict
<span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> numpy
<span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> operator
<span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> pandas
<span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> perfplot


<span class="hljs-keyword">def</span> <span class="hljs-title function_">counter</span>(<span class="hljs-params">a</span>):
    <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> Counter(a)


<span class="hljs-keyword">def</span> <span class="hljs-title function_">count</span>(<span class="hljs-params">a</span>):
    <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">dict</span>((i, a.count(i)) <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> i <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">set</span>(a))


<span class="hljs-keyword">def</span> <span class="hljs-title function_">bincount</span>(<span class="hljs-params">a</span>):
    <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> numpy.bincount(a)


<span class="hljs-keyword">def</span> <span class="hljs-title function_">pandas_value_counts</span>(<span class="hljs-params">a</span>):
    <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> pandas.Series(a).value_counts()


<span class="hljs-keyword">def</span> <span class="hljs-title function_">occur_dict</span>(<span class="hljs-params">a</span>):
    d = {}
    <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> i <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> a:
        <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> i <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> d:
            d[i] = d[i] + <span class="hljs-number">1</span>
        <span class="hljs-keyword">else</span>:
            d[i] = <span class="hljs-number">1</span>
    <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> d


<span class="hljs-keyword">def</span> <span class="hljs-title function_">count_unsorted_list_items</span>(<span class="hljs-params">items</span>):
    counts = defaultdict(<span class="hljs-built_in">int</span>)
    <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> item <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> items:
        counts[item] += <span class="hljs-number">1</span>
    <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">dict</span>(counts)


<span class="hljs-keyword">def</span> <span class="hljs-title function_">operator_countof</span>(<span class="hljs-params">a</span>):
    <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">dict</span>((i, operator.countOf(a, i)) <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> i <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">set</span>(a))


b = perfplot.bench(
    setup=<span class="hljs-keyword">lambda</span> n: <span class="hljs-built_in">list</span>(numpy.random.randint(<span class="hljs-number">0</span>, <span class="hljs-number">100</span>, n)),
    n_range=[<span class="hljs-number">2</span> ** k <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> k <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">range</span>(<span class="hljs-number">20</span>)],
    kernels=[
        counter,
        count,
        bincount,
        pandas_value_counts,
        occur_dict,
        count_unsorted_list_items,
        operator_countof,
    ],
    equality_check=<span class="hljs-literal">None</span>,
)
b.save(<span class="hljs-string">"out.png"</span>)
b.show()
</code></pre>

<pre class="lang-py s-code-block"><code class="hljs language-python"><span class="hljs-comment"># Python &gt;= 2.6 (defaultdict) &amp;&amp; &lt; 2.7 (Counter, OrderedDict)</span>
<span class="hljs-keyword">from</span> collections <span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> defaultdict
<span class="hljs-keyword">def</span> <span class="hljs-title function_">count_unsorted_list_items</span>(<span class="hljs-params">items</span>):
    <span class="hljs-string">"""
    :param items: iterable of hashable items to count
    :type items: iterable

    :returns: dict of counts like Py2.7 Counter
    :rtype: dict
    """</span>
    counts = defaultdict(<span class="hljs-built_in">int</span>)
    <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> item <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> items:
        counts[item] += <span class="hljs-number">1</span>
    <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">dict</span>(counts)


<span class="hljs-comment"># Python &gt;= 2.2 (generators)</span>
<span class="hljs-keyword">def</span> <span class="hljs-title function_">count_sorted_list_items</span>(<span class="hljs-params">items</span>):
    <span class="hljs-string">"""
    :param items: sorted iterable of items to count
    :type items: sorted iterable

    :returns: generator of (item, count) tuples
    :rtype: generator
    """</span>
    <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">not</span> items:
        <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span>
    <span class="hljs-keyword">elif</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">len</span>(items) == <span class="hljs-number">1</span>:
        <span class="hljs-keyword">yield</span> (items[<span class="hljs-number">0</span>], <span class="hljs-number">1</span>)
        <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span>
    prev_item = items[<span class="hljs-number">0</span>]
    count = <span class="hljs-number">1</span>
    <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> item <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> items[<span class="hljs-number">1</span>:]:
        <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> prev_item == item:
            count += <span class="hljs-number">1</span>
        <span class="hljs-keyword">else</span>:
            <span class="hljs-keyword">yield</span> (prev_item, count)
            count = <span class="hljs-number">1</span>
            prev_item = item
    <span class="hljs-keyword">yield</span> (item, count)
    <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span>


<span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> unittest
<span class="hljs-keyword">class</span> <span class="hljs-title class_">TestListCounters</span>(unittest.TestCase):
    <span class="hljs-keyword">def</span> <span class="hljs-title function_">test_count_unsorted_list_items</span>(<span class="hljs-params">self</span>):
        D = (
            ([], []),
            ([<span class="hljs-number">2</span>], [(<span class="hljs-number">2</span>,<span class="hljs-number">1</span>)]),
            ([<span class="hljs-number">2</span>,<span class="hljs-number">2</span>], [(<span class="hljs-number">2</span>,<span class="hljs-number">2</span>)]),
            ([<span class="hljs-number">2</span>,<span class="hljs-number">2</span>,<span class="hljs-number">2</span>,<span class="hljs-number">2</span>,<span class="hljs-number">3</span>,<span class="hljs-number">3</span>,<span class="hljs-number">5</span>,<span class="hljs-number">5</span>], [(<span class="hljs-number">2</span>,<span class="hljs-number">4</span>), (<span class="hljs-number">3</span>,<span class="hljs-number">2</span>), (<span class="hljs-number">5</span>,<span class="hljs-number">2</span>)]),
            )
        <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> inp, exp_outp <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> D:
            counts = count_unsorted_list_items(inp) 
            <span class="hljs-built_in">print</span> inp, exp_outp, counts
            self.assertEqual(counts, <span class="hljs-built_in">dict</span>( exp_outp ))

        inp, exp_outp = UNSORTED_WIN = ([<span class="hljs-number">2</span>,<span class="hljs-number">2</span>,<span class="hljs-number">4</span>,<span class="hljs-number">2</span>], [(<span class="hljs-number">2</span>,<span class="hljs-number">3</span>), (<span class="hljs-number">4</span>,<span class="hljs-number">1</span>)])
        self.assertEqual(<span class="hljs-built_in">dict</span>( exp_outp ), count_unsorted_list_items(inp) )


    <span class="hljs-keyword">def</span> <span class="hljs-title function_">test_count_sorted_list_items</span>(<span class="hljs-params">self</span>):
        D = (
            ([], []),
            ([<span class="hljs-number">2</span>], [(<span class="hljs-number">2</span>,<span class="hljs-number">1</span>)]),
            ([<span class="hljs-number">2</span>,<span class="hljs-number">2</span>], [(<span class="hljs-number">2</span>,<span class="hljs-number">2</span>)]),
            ([<span class="hljs-number">2</span>,<span class="hljs-number">2</span>,<span class="hljs-number">2</span>,<span class="hljs-number">2</span>,<span class="hljs-number">3</span>,<span class="hljs-number">3</span>,<span class="hljs-number">5</span>,<span class="hljs-number">5</span>], [(<span class="hljs-number">2</span>,<span class="hljs-number">4</span>), (<span class="hljs-number">3</span>,<span class="hljs-number">2</span>), (<span class="hljs-number">5</span>,<span class="hljs-number">2</span>)]),
            )
        <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> inp, exp_outp <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> D:
            counts = <span class="hljs-built_in">list</span>( count_sorted_list_items(inp) )
            <span class="hljs-built_in">print</span> inp, exp_outp, counts
            self.assertEqual(counts, exp_outp)

        inp, exp_outp = UNSORTED_FAIL = ([<span class="hljs-number">2</span>,<span class="hljs-number">2</span>,<span class="hljs-number">4</span>,<span class="hljs-number">2</span>], [(<span class="hljs-number">2</span>,<span class="hljs-number">3</span>), (<span class="hljs-number">4</span>,<span class="hljs-number">1</span>)])
        self.assertEqual(exp_outp, <span class="hljs-built_in">list</span>( count_sorted_list_items(inp) ))
        <span class="hljs-comment"># ... [(2,2), (4,1), (2,1)]</span>
</code></pre>

<pre class="lang-py s-code-block"><code class="hljs language-python">l2=[<span class="hljs-number">1</span>,<span class="hljs-string">"feto"</span>,[<span class="hljs-string">"feto"</span>,<span class="hljs-number">1</span>,[<span class="hljs-string">"feto"</span>]],[<span class="hljs-string">'feto'</span>,[<span class="hljs-number">1</span>,<span class="hljs-number">2</span>,<span class="hljs-number">3</span>,[<span class="hljs-string">'feto'</span>]]]]
count=<span class="hljs-number">0</span>
 <span class="hljs-keyword">def</span> <span class="hljs-title function_">Test</span>(<span class="hljs-params">l</span>):   
        <span class="hljs-keyword">global</span> count 
        <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">len</span>(l)==<span class="hljs-number">0</span>:
             <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> count
        count=l.count(<span class="hljs-string">"feto"</span>)
        <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> i <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> l:
             <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">type</span>(i) <span class="hljs-keyword">is</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">list</span>:
                count+=Test(i)
        <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> count   
    <span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(Test(l2))
</code></pre>

<p><strong>this will recursive count or search for the item in the list even if it in list of lists</strong></p>

<pre class="lang-py s-code-block"><code class="hljs language-python">test = [<span class="hljs-number">409.1</span>, <span class="hljs-number">479.0</span>, <span class="hljs-number">340.0</span>, <span class="hljs-number">282.4</span>, <span class="hljs-number">406.0</span>, <span class="hljs-number">300.0</span>, <span class="hljs-number">374.0</span>, <span class="hljs-number">253.3</span>, <span class="hljs-number">195.1</span>, <span class="hljs-number">269.0</span>, <span class="hljs-number">329.3</span>, <span class="hljs-number">250.7</span>, <span class="hljs-number">250.7</span>, <span class="hljs-number">345.3</span>, <span class="hljs-number">379.3</span>, <span class="hljs-number">275.0</span>, <span class="hljs-number">215.2</span>, <span class="hljs-number">300.0</span>]

<span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> i <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> test:
    <span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(<span class="hljs-string">'{} numbers {}'</span>.<span class="hljs-built_in">format</span>(i, test.count(i)))
</code></pre>
